title: Some of the Tech Magic Is Gone - The New York Times
content:
1. Some of the Tech Magic Is Gone  The New York Times
  2. 2 Smartest Tech Stocks To Buy in 2022 and Beyond  The Motley Fool
  3. It's time to buy the best beaten-down stocks in tech and elsewhere, and this winning fund manger shows you how  MarketWatch

description: The bubble hasn’t exactly burst, but we’re no longer seeing a fantastical belief in the power of technology.
